body:
From the FTP server (http://ftp.mcs.anl.gov/pub/fathom) disappeared version 5.0.2. To fix that problem, the source code is uploaded from the git repository, pointing on a specific commit. Also, added version 5.0.1 and installation from the master and develop branch. 

In order to install MoAB from git repository, additional dependencies are added, for autoconf and associated tools.
title: fix moab installation for version 5.0.2 removed from ftp
